trans-unit.source: Provides methods to add work to a work batch.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce metodi per aggiungere lavoro a un batch di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Services use this interface to add pending work to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Servizi utilizzano questa interfaccia per aggiungere lavoro in sospeso a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a pending work item to a work batch.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un elemento di lavoro in sospeso per un batch di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to add pending work items to a work batch.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per aggiungere elementi di lavoro in sospeso per un batch di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The `workItem` object added to the batch is associated with `work`, an object that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> interface.
trans-unit.target: Il `workItem` associato all'oggetto aggiunto al batch `work`, un oggetto che implementa il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>interfaccia.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>

trans-unit.source: Methods provided by this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> object will be called to handle the eventual commit of the `workItem`.
trans-unit.target: I metodi forniti da questo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>verrà chiamato per gestire l'eventuale commit di oggetto di `workItem`.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>

trans-unit.source: Services use this method to add pending work to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Servizi utilizzano questo metodo per aggiungere lavoro in sospeso a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object on which work is to be performed.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto in cui è possibile eseguire il lavoro.
